title: Torrington Estate sets up all-time record price
body_lines: Torrington Estate established an all-time record price of Rs. 2,500 per kg for a FBOP grade in the Western High Grown Region at this week’s tea auctions held on 18-19 May.
This Estate is reputed for manufacturing high-quality tea and is Rainforest Alliance certified.
Torrington Estate is managed by Agarapatana Plantations Ltd., under the stewardship of W.P.N. Wasantha.
Teas of Torrington Estate are exclusively marketed by Forbes & Walker Tea Brokers Ltd.
